extracted_metadata.title: Atlas of Palestine 1917-1966 (Promo)
extracted_metadata.description: The Atlas of Palestine 1917-1966 by Doctor Salman Abu Sitta, is a unique most comprehensive record of Palestine during this period, acclaimed by leading scholars. The atlas has a total of 700 pages, including 550 color pages of all Palestine, as well as 150 Pages of analysis of the Mandate.
